attributes.action: Undertake a full reveiw of the provision of utilities in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the consumer are currently subject to grossly unfair profiteering by all utility companies, Gas Electric and Water. In addition to this thier contractors are making huge profits on the back of charging over inflated prices for contrct works (One Water Company are prepared to pay £161K to refit a manhole lid a job which should cost only £5000!) 

The prime minister must therefore undertake a full review of the provision of such comapnies to further cap the profits they are able to make at the expense of the consumer.

This practice must stop and utility companies must be banned from makeing overinflated profits at our expense
